Segment.name: FRM
Segment.comment: To specify information in response to a codified questionnaire document

Field.name: AssignedIdentification
Field.comment: Alphanumeric characters assigned for differentiation within a transaction set

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

SyntaxNote.name: R02030405
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of FRM02, FRM03, FRM04 or FRM05 is required.
